companies.name: colormass
companies.description:
colormass is a SaaS platform that simplifies and scales the management of 3D content - all in one centralized, cloud-based ecosystem. From rendering marketing visuals to building configurators and exporting assets for diverse applications, colormass streamlines every aspect of 3D content management.

In addition, colormass offers advanced 3D digitization tools, including an svBRDF scanner, a Tiling Editor, and Material AI - which transforms single images into high-quality PBR materials.

Trusted by leading brands across the automotive, interior design, apparel, and luxury sectors, colormass enables companies to digitize tens of thousands of new products each year and manage 3D data at scale.
